title: Where are the championship jewels?
body:
I can't find the championship jewels in the shop. I am almost at 10 for the gold icon. Where are they in the shop?

Any help appreciated, thanks!

replies.body: The championship jewels can be found through Championship Chests.  You can buy some individiually only on game days, which can be tracked in our[ Worlds guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)calendar.  Let me know if you have any questions!

It's normal, full jewel calendar and more explanation here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-
